title: Tyreek Hill signs, AFC moves, Kyle Hamilton and Kyren Williams Draft Preview, Do Chiefs have enough? and Kyler Murray Drama
itunes:title: Tyreek Hill signs, AFC moves, Kyle Hamilton and Kyren Williams Draft Preview, Do Chiefs have enough? and Kyler Murray Drama
description:
The latest edition of The Good Morning Football Podcast starts with Tyreek Hill signing with the Dolphins.  Hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Tom Pelissero, and Fmr Pro Bowl RB Maurice Jones-Drew ask which AFC teams need to make a move to keep up.  We learn more about NFL Prospect Kyle Hamilton and Maurice Jones-Drew breaks down another Notre Dame alum, RB Kyren Williams, as both prepare for the NFL Draft. The table discusses if the Chiefs have enough skill position players to grow for next season.  Plus, where are the Cardinals right now with Kyler Murray.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
